resources.string: Add an item above to get started.
Touch a photo to expand it.
On a a scale of 0 (not at all) to 5 (very severely/often), how stressed do you feel this week?
How worried about the future do you feel?
How overworked did you feel this week?
Is getting enough sleep a problem for you?
How often do you fall asleep in class?
How often do you pull all-nighters?
Is your exercise low-intensity/effort? (5 being no exercise, 0 being most intense)
Did your weight increase? (0 being not at all, 5 being drastically)
Are your relationships with others (friends, family, romantic) unstable?
How much of your time do you spend alone? (0 being never hanging out with others)
Do you spend all your time on class (0 being spending much of your time on outside hobbies/activities, 5 being spending all your time on class)
How bored by/uninterested in the class material are you?
Do you feel that what you\'re learning doesn\'t matter?
How difficult do you find the class?
Do you feel that the class moves too fast?
Was the workload in this class demanding?
